name: elections-carousel
description: Carousel presentation of data from a JSON feed of election results
author: Heini Fagerlund

scripts.build:all:production: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:css: npm run clean:css && npm run scss && npm run minify:css
scripts.build:js: npm run clean:js && npm run minify:js
scripts.minify:css: echo '=> minify:css' && cleancss --skip-advanced dist/css/screen.css -o dist/css/screen.min.css && cleancss --skip-advanced dist/css/print.css -o dist/css/print.min.css
scripts.travis: npm run lint && npm run qunit
